knimeNode.name: Range Slider Filter Definition
knimeNode.shortDescription: Defines a filter hint to the input table and provides an interactive slider view.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
Double Column containing domain values to be used for minimum and maximum settings.
The value that is output by default.

knimeNode.interactiveView: Select a range for interactive filtering.

inPort.name: Table Input with applicable domain values

ports.inPort: Optional input table which contains at least one double column with domain values set, which can be used to control the minimum and maximum values of the slider.
ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
